Package org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.pipe

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollectorEvaluationContext<T extends Serializable>
    This implementation of the EvaluationContext binds to a Flink Collector, so all collected GenericEvents are automatically in the output stream of Flink.
    CollectorEvaluationContext.Builder<T extends Serializable>
    Creates instances of the type CollectorEvaluationContext
    CrunchFlinkPipelineFactory<T extends Serializable>
    This class creates on base of the EvaluationPipeline construct a Flink pipeline.
    EvaluationProcessFunction<T extends Serializable>
    Creates a ProcessFunction binded to a list of EvaluationFunctions from a SubStream.
    EvaluationProcessFunction.Builder<T extends Serializable>
    Creates instances of the EvaluationProcessFunction and checks ingoing parameters
    RecordProcessFunction
    Creates a ProcessFunction binded to a list of RecordHandlers from a SubStream.
    RecordProcessFunction.Builder
    Creates instances of the RecordProcessFunction and checks ingoing parameters
